item.title: Vagrant Going from old and busted, to new hotness
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: Vagrant is an amazing application for helping you manage your virtual machines. Renewed development effort by it's creators has brought us many new features. Unfortunately this forced a change in the semantics of the Vagrantfile. Here is how to do the most basic upgrades to remove the warning messages Vagrant creates from using the older file type.
